entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 7:56PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Widely Scattered Strong Thunderstorms Will Continue through this Evening... Isolated to widely scattered thunderstorms, some strong, will be possible through the evening across the southern Interior and higher elevation inland mountains. Frequent lightning, strong and gusty winds, and small hail with heavy downpours are all possible.
